Dr RamÃ³n A. Azuara SÃ¡nchez is the Director General of Renfe Viajeros on the General Operations board of Renfe Group. With a Bachelors in Business Science, he has developed his career within Renfe, having started in 1983. Among other responsibilities, he has held the positions of Director of Commuter Customers, Commercial Director and Commuter Planning, Project Manager and Innovation of Commuter and Middle Distance Stations, Director of Management Control and Purchasing of the General Directorate of Travelers.
